title: Did Mike Pence Say He Won’t Utter the Words ‘Homo Sapiens’?
subtitle: According to an internet report, the U.S. vice president is also not fond of the words 'homophone' and 'homogenized.'
author: David Emery
vclaim: U.S. Vice President Mike Pence said he doesn't like to use the scientific term "homo sapiens" because it's "unnecessarily sexual."
